verbose_text: AK, with its excitotoxic effect produced by the degradation of mitochondrial protein synthesis and overactivation of glutamate receptors (N-methyl-D-aspartate), increases the formation of free radicals and induces apoptosis, and thus generates its ototoxic effect [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: AK, with its excitotoxic effect produced by the degradation of mitochondrial protein synthesis and overactivation of glutamate receptors (N-methyl-D-aspartate), increases the formation of free radicals and induces apoptosis
